title: Russian Alphabet – Part 1
content: Learn the first half of the Russian alphabet: А, Б, В, Г, Д, Е, Ё, Ж, З, И. Each letter has its own sound, similar to English in some cases, but others are unique to Russian. Practice pronouncing each letter slowly.

title: Russian Alphabet – Part 2
content: Learn the second half of the Russian alphabet: Й, К, Л, М, Н, О, П, Р, С, Т, У, Ф, Х, Ц, Ч, Ш, Щ, Ъ, Ы, Ь, Э, Ю, Я. Pay attention to soft and hard sounds.

title: Basic Greetings
content: Learn how to say hello, goodbye, and common greetings. Example: Здравствуйте (Hello), Привет (Hi), Пока (Bye), До свидания (Goodbye).

title: Introducing Yourself
content: Learn how to introduce yourself: Меня зовут [Name] (My name is [Name]). Я из [Country] (I am from [Country]).

title: Numbers 1–10
content: Learn numbers from 1 to 10 in Russian: один, два, три, четыре, пять, шесть, семь, восемь, девять, десять.

title: Days of the Week
content: Learn days of the week: Понедельник (Monday), Вторник (Tuesday), Среда (Wednesday), Четверг (Thursday), Пятница (Friday), Суббота (Saturday), Воскресенье (Sunday).

title: Common Phrases for Travelers
content: Learn basic phrases: Где туалет? (Where is the bathroom?), Сколько это стоит? (How much does it cost?), Я не говорю по-русски (I don’t speak Russian).

title: Ordering Food
content: Learn how to order food: Я хочу [dish] (I want [dish]), Пожалуйста (Please), Спасибо (Thank you).

title: Asking for Directions
content: Learn direction phrases: Где находится...? (Where is...?), Прямо (Straight), Налево (Left), Направо (Right).

title: Basic Grammar – Present Tense
content: Learn how verbs work in present tense. Example: Я читаю (I read), Ты читаешь (You read), Он читает (He reads).
